about


Hi I’m Laura Juo-Hsin Chen! I enjoys realizing fantasy, with mixed virtual reality, doodle, and lots of handcrafts. My latest project is MASK, a collection of multi-user virtual reality masks that explore identity shifting.

Here is where I document things for Programming From A to Z Fall 2015, a class taught by Daniel Shiffman in ITP.
